column1: 1. THREE rounds will be given to each member to rotate and answer questions.
2. One question will be asked in each round.
3. Players have the option to select the first card from either the unanswered questions deck  or the pile of discards during each round of play.
4. Players have the option to accept or decline to answer the question displayed on the chosen card.
5. If the player answers the question correctly
column2: they will receive the score stated on the card.
if the player answers the question on the discarded card
column3: only 80% of the overall score that is stated on the card can be obtained.

column1: 7. Player needs to place the answered question card at the top of another answered card deck.
8. Player must discard the current question card to the end of the deck of discarded cards.
